Key Match Events: Trey Sweeney hit a leadoff home run in the third inning
Kerry Carpenter drove in a run in the third inning
Six runs were scored in the eighth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers took two out of three in Oakland
The A's will play their home games in Sacramento next season ahead of a planned move to Las Vegas in 2028
Others: Trey Sweeney went 4 for 4 with a walk
Lawrence Butler's fifth-inning single was the A's first hit and extended his career-best hit streak to 18 games
Zack Gelof drove in Oakland's lone run with a sixth inning single
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch walked up to Mt. Davis — the tarped-off third deck — before the game and called his final moments managing at the Coliseum ‘bittersweet’
